meanings.definition: One of a series of body segments in animals, such as earthworms.
meanings.sent1: The earthworm's body is made up of several metamers.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the metamer of the earthworm closely.
meanings.sent3: The metamer of the earthworm decided to go on a solo adventure.
meanings.sent4: Each metamer of the earthworm is like a tiny puzzle piece in the whole picture.
meanings.sent5: The metamer of the earthworm wriggled with excitement.

meanings.definition: A compound that can be transformed into another compound with the same molecular formula but a different structure.
meanings.sent1: The chemist synthesized a new metamer in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The metamer reacted differently under varying conditions.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous metamer played tricks on the other compounds.
meanings.sent4: The metamer's transformation was like a caterpillar turning into a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The unique properties of the metamer fascinated the researchers.
